entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Deer Regional Airport 3:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.9°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Dewpoint: -3.1°C
Wind: S 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries or rain showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries and rain showers beginning before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries and rain showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the evening and 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
